name: Mayan Hot Chocolate
description: Warm up with rich, creamy hot chocolate with a South American twist.
preparation:
1. Whip cream and vanilla extract to form soft peaks.
  2. In Multipurpose Pot, combine milk, Cinnamon and chipotle chili. Heat to just below boiling, being careful not to burn the milk.
  3. Remove pot from heat. Add Hot Chocolate Mix and stir until fully blended.
  4. Divide between four mugs and top with whipped cream. Serve with a cinnamon stir stick.
tips: Make it with partly-skimmed evaporated milk for extra creaminess without the fat.
